title: Across the Veil
description: #1 Amazon Best Seller -Science Fiction & Fantasy > Fantasy > Anthologies & Short Stories #1 Amazon Best Seller - Literature & Fiction > Short Stories   Princess Talia from Summerland has been hiding across the veil in the human world for the past five years.  Starring in a hit television show as human actress, Natalie Thurmont, her charmed new life is shattered when the past comes knocking on her door.  "Across the Veil" won Romance in the Backseat book review's Paranormal Fight Club short story contest.  Short Fiction (6,200 words)
author: Lisa Kessler
